Module contents

mymetal.calculate.cal_atom_num(atoms: Atoms = None) → int
mymetal.calculate.cal_mismatch(bottom: Atoms = None, top: Atoms = None, hetero: Atoms = None) → float

For calculating the max mismatch.

return a list

>> [a_mismatch, b_mismatch, gamma_mismatch]

mymetal.calculate.cal_stretch(bottom: Atoms = None, top: Atoms = None, hetero: Atoms = None) → float

For calculating the stretch of bottom and top layer.

return two list:

>> [a_bot_stretch, b_bot_stretch, gamma_bot_stretch], [a_to_stretch, b_to_stretch, gamma_to_stretch]

mymetal.calculate.compare_atoms(atoms1: Atoms = None, atoms2: Atoms = None, tolerance: float = 1e-05, focus_z: bool = True) → list

Compare cell length, angle, cartesian position, scaled position.

Return a list of bool

>> [True, Ture, True, True]

mymetal.calculate.filter_results(bottom: float = None, top: float = None, results: list = None, length_mismatch: float = 0.05, angle_mismatch: float = 0.05, sorting_func=<function <lambda>>)

Filter results of heterostructures based on specified mismatches in length and angle.

param bottom:

Parameter related to the bottom layer of the heterostructure.

type bottom:

float

param top:

Parameter related to the top layer of the heterostructure.

type top:

float

param results:

List of heterostructure results to filter.

type results:

list

param length_mismatch:

Maximum allowable relative difference in length.

type length_mismatch:

float

param angle_mismatch:

Maximum allowable angle difference in degrees.

type angle_mismatch:

float

param sorting_func:

Function to determine the key for sorting results.

type sorting_func:

function

returns:

Filtered list of heterostructure results.

rtype:

list

mymetal.calculate.relative_diff(bottom: float = None, top: float = None, hetero: float = None) → float

For calculate: max(abs(bottom - hetero)/bottom, abs(top - hetero)/top).
